SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONTEST T1
T1.CONTEST_DEL_YN = 'N'
AND (CONTEST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CONTEST_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND T1.CONTEST_GUBUN IN
#{item}
AND T1.CONTEST_TARGET IN
#{item}
AND
CONTEST_END_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
CONTEST_END_DATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY
T1.CONTEST_ID,
CASE WHEN T1.CONTEST_END_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, -- 1. 진행중인 공모전 먼저
T1.CONTEST_END_DATE DESC -- '최신순' 선택 시: 등록일 내림차순
T1.CONTEST_RECRUIT_COUNT DESC -- '조회수순'은 조회수(RECRUIT_COUNT) 기준
T1.CONTEST_END_DATE ASC, -- '마감일순' 선택 시: 마감일 오름차순 T1.CONTEST_CREATED_AT DESC -- (2차 정렬) 마감일이 같으면 최신 등록순
) AS RNUM ,T1.CONTEST_ID AS contestId ,T1.CONTEST_TITLE AS contestTitle ,T1.CONTEST_GUBUN AS contestGubunCode ,GUBUN.CC_NAME AS contestGubunName ,T1.CONTEST_DESCRIPTION AS contestDescription ,T1.CONTEST_TYPE AS contestType ,TYPE.CC_NAME AS contestTypeName ,T1.CONTEST_TARGET AS contestTarget ,TARGET.CC_NAME AS contestTargetName ,T1.CONTEST_START_DATE AS contestStartDate ,T1.CONTEST_END_DATE AS contestEndDate ,T1.CONTEST_CREATED_AT AS contestCreatedAt ,T1.CONTEST_RECRUIT_COUNT AS contestRecruitCount ,T1.CONTEST_URL AS contestUrl ,T1.FILE_GROUP_ID AS fileGroupId ,T1.CONTEST_HOST AS contestHost ,T1.CONTEST_ORGANIZER AS contestOrganizer ,T1.CONTEST_SPONSOR AS contestSponsor ,T1.APPLICATION_METHOD AS applicationMethod ,T1.AWARD_TYPE AS awardType FROM CONTEST T1 LEFT JOIN COM_CODE GUBUN ON T1.CONTEST_GUBUN = GUBUN.CC_ID AND GUBUN.CL_CODE = 'G32' LEFT JOIN COM_CODE TYPE ON T1.CONTEST_TYPE = TYPE.CC_ID AND TYPE.CL_CODE = 'G35' LEFT JOIN COM_CODE TARGET ON T1.CONTEST_TARGET = TARGET.CC_ID AND TARGET.CL_CODE = 'G34'
T1.CONTEST_DEL_YN = 'N'
AND (T1.CONTEST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR T1.CONTEST_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND T1.CONTEST_GUBUN IN
#{item}
AND T1.CONTEST_TARGET IN
#{item}
AND
CONTEST_END_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
CONTEST_END_DATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE)
) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT T1.CONTEST_ID AS contestId ,T1.CONTEST_TITLE AS contestTitle ,T1.CONTEST_GUBUN AS contestGubunCode ,GUBUN.CC_NAME AS contestGubunName ,T1.CONTEST_DESCRIPTION AS contestDescription ,T1.CONTEST_TYPE AS contestType ,TYPE.CC_NAME AS contestTypeName ,T1.CONTEST_TARGET AS contestTarget ,TARGET.CC_NAME AS contestTargetName ,T1.CONTEST_START_DATE AS contestStartDate ,T1.CONTEST_END_DATE AS contestEndDate ,T1.CONTEST_CREATED_AT AS contestCreatedAt ,T1.CONTEST_RECRUIT_COUNT AS contestRecruitCount ,T1.CONTEST_URL AS contestUrl ,T1.FILE_GROUP_ID AS fileGroupId ,T1.CONTEST_HOST AS contestHost ,T1.CONTEST_ORGANIZER AS contestOrganizer ,T1.CONTEST_SPONSOR AS contestSponsor ,T1.APPLICATION_METHOD AS applicationMethod ,T1.AWARD_TYPE AS awardType FROM CONTEST T1 LEFT JOIN COM_CODE GUBUN ON T1.CONTEST_GUBUN = GUBUN.CC_ID AND GUBUN.CL_CODE = 'G32' LEFT JOIN COM_CODE TYPE ON T1.CONTEST_TYPE = TYPE.CC_ID AND TYPE.CL_CODE = 'G35' LEFT JOIN COM_CODE TARGET ON T1.CONTEST_TARGET = TARGET.CC_ID AND TARGET.CL_CODE = 'G34' WHERE CONTEST_ID = #{supId} AND T1.CONTEST_DEL_YN = 'N'
